评论详情: The dress is beautiful and comfortable. It fits true to size. If you have a bigger chest, I definitely do not recommend this dress. I tried to wear it without a bra and that just was not an option and then I put on a topless bra and you could see the bra. I got this for a destination wedding and had no choice, but to wear it with my bra showing which looks awful. I refuse to be in my family picture. Zoom in to see what I'm saying. If you have a small chest then it will be perfect!
Was perfect for our friend's wedding in November! I love the color
Paid full price for a dress that arrived USED. Smelled like body odor and wrinkled. There are no tags either.

I ended up returning this because the front stitching didn’t look good. It might look good with someone that has an A cup. I wear a 34C and it looked ridiculous on me. The stitching cut right through them middle and it did not look good.

You can tell American sizes are being changed as we all get larger. I got a large, and it was more XL. It had a lot of awkward room at the upper chest area and the waist didn’t sit in a flattering area and the elastic was too loose to try and let me pull it up at all.
I couldn’t even wear the dress one full night because the strap broke. Return window was too late. Bummed!
Returned, fabric seemed cheap and very easily wrinkled.

评论概述: A little see through in the sun
评论详情: Absolutely gorgeous dress. It was very comfy and perfect for the wedding i attended.  I ordered a M and it fit perfect.
Very pretty Kelly green. Don’t expect it to go to the ground! Love the cut out in the back
I bought this dress for my engagement photos and it was wonderful! It fit great and looked perfect in the pictures! Highly recommend!!
Very wrinkly and hard to get them out even after wash, iorn.. but was able to get most of them out to wear and it is very cute and comfy. There are no pockets.

Wore to an outdoor wedding in the summer.  Was a comfortable dress, love the color and got tons of compliments.  The dress wrinkles VERY easily though.  I steamed it prior to the wedding but just sitting in the car to get there made it super wrinkly again.  It ended up raining and the dress got super muddy at the bottom but washed up really well.

Wasn’t sure if I was going to wear this for family photos, but I’m glad I did. Appears flattering enough for a mom bod. Bought a Large. I typically wear a 12. 5’7” (190lbs). My chest wasn’t secure with movement, it was very open - I’m a 38 C/D - but I wore silicone nip covers & went with it. I can see the material drooping over a night & being difficult to stay up, but only wearing it for photos, it was fine. Washed a bit awkward after the first wear, overall, happy I wore it. Definitely felt as if it’s priced steep for the quality, but the color was perfect.

I bought this dress for my honeymoon to Italy. It was absolutely perfect! Just to note, the dress is long (I am 5'8" and it when down to the tops of my sneakers). It is lightweight and comfortable. I am usually a L, but I did end of sizing down to a medium so the top and open back fit better.
I love this dress! Fabric is decent quality. The top and shape of the dress is so flattering. I am 5’1 and XS was perfect length, hits right at the ankle without heels
This is very flattering. Lemme say though, if you don't have big breasts, it may not fit properly. It's light and good quality and not see through
This dree says thatvits for tall people but I am 5 foot 8 inches and it was not long enough for me. If it was longer it would have worked as it was comfortable.
The dress is cute but the color is different, I bought the red one and it is matte, looks cheap
Better than I thought.

评论概述: Cute but fabric quality not great
评论详情: I tried it, I was excited to use it, because it fit beautiful.  I steamed it, put it on, as soon as I sat tu put shoes on it got wrinkled.  I have not taken tag off s decided to use my back up dress.
great quality and very vibrant!
Perfect for a summer day out

The dress is very cheap quality for the price. The fabric is very thin and very see through. It came in excessively wrinkly. I understand that can be steamed but this one in particular was definitely used by someone else. I could tell by the blood stain on the dress and lack of tag.

I am on the short side at 5'0, so it can be hard to find a maxi dress that doesn't drag on the floor. This is great with 1-2 inch heels, and has a nice flowy-ness that was perfect for a bridesmaid brunch. After washing, it shrunk about 0.5 inch, which was helpful in my case.
Loved the fit and flow. Really beautiful. I’m 5’2” 145lbs and I bought a size medium. Fit well!
This dress looks nothing like the picture. It’s short and the color looks green. The fabric smells and is very wrinkly and the stitching is loose. Looks washed and used. Returned asap!!!
Fantastic product as expected
5’10, 150, 36B. Bought a size medium and fit great. Doesn’t need a bra but there’s no support so beware. Also came super wrinkled but worked after I streamed it out. Cute but casual maxi

评论概述: If you have a chest… it is revealing
评论详情: For reference: I ordered a medium, 150lbs, 5’2”, and a 36D. I actually love this dress, but I am returning because it is too revealing in the chest for the event I am planning to wear it for. But the quality is great, and the purple is a pretty color! Also, if you are on the short side the dress will hit the ground.

So I really wanted to love this but it doesn’t fit as I need but I’m managing to make it work. I’m a 38 D so I ordered a large so my chest would fit comfortably & once putting it on and tying it the sides by my boobs have these little flaps of extra fabric which I hate it looks goofy so I order a medium an that was way too small in the chest. I ended up keeping the large and tying it as absolutely tight as possible, it’s a little manageable but it does look kinda goofy as I to tighten it completely in the back and bring it around my waist to the front to tie it off. The large is very long on me too so I’m constantly stepping on it which isn’t the best. Overall I wish it were better I’m not entirely satisfied with us but trying to make it work.
Great dress! I’m pretty petite, so it’s hard to find dresses that fit my square body type. Hugs in all the right places. Very good quality
First wash of this item on delicate wash, cold water the seems split. I have yet to even wear this dress. It hasn’t been dried and was washed by itself. Very poorly made. Very disappointed.
I got an XS but it still was too big on me. It was actually a nice looking dress but just didn’t fit well.
Showed up a wrinkle mess. I don’t know if I could have ever gotten all the wrinkles out. The material also reminded me of a bed sheet.
Flattering dress for going out plus super comfortable. Glad I purchased!

评论概述: Nice fabric, didn't look good on me
评论详情: I really wanted to like this and while the fabric was very soft and lovely the fit just wasn't it. I tried adjusting the straps in a variety of ways and it just never looked right in the chest area. Perhaps it was just the wrong fit but I don't think this cut is for everyone but, the fabric was soft, and lovely!

I am 5'4 130lbs and I ordered a small and it fit me well. The bust is a little big bit not really noticeable  to others but I noticed it. I am small chested so that has always been an issue. It fit perfectly for being 5'4 in length it didn't drag or even touch the ground. It will need to be ironed/steamed before wearing it. I ordered the dark green and that's exactly what it looked like. I loved this dress
Too thin

评论概述: Very comfortable and flattering. Material is nice.
评论详情: Everything fit really well.
It was a little long, but after I washed it it shrunk & shortened quite a bit. The adjustable straps allowed me to position the neckline in a way that was super flattering.

Ordered this dress for a wedding I’m attending and it fits perfect ! For reference I’m 5’9 and I ordered a large!  Only thing to keep in mind is that it comes in super wrinkly but other than that I love it !
in the photos the dress is dirty pink this is way to bright for my event :/

This was a perfect pick for an outdoor wedding. Good length, got lots of compliments, and was so comfy the whole night. The light color DEFINITELY showed underboob sweat and the cup size was a tiny bit too long (maybe it's just that I can't fill it), but I would definitely wear this again

Honestly surprised how much I LOVE this dress. I wasn’t sure how I would like the small cutout/tie back situation but so glad I went with this option. Quality material, fabric is breathable, lightweight but not sheer or see through and fit as expected. I am pretty short, so the dress was of course a bit long, but with straps being adjustable and wearing some tall wedges it worked out better than I expected. I would absolutely say it’s worth the money.
Weight 185 Height 5’2 I love this dress and it was perfect for the winery.
Once the wrinkles are out it will be beautiful! Adjustable straps is wonderful. 5’2 - 119 lbs and got a small. Nice fabric. Wonderful for a guest of a wedding or family pictures!

This is a nice dress, I'm happy with the purchase. The color and style are both pleasing. I will say that the fit of the dress between the straps/tie can be a little tricky to get just right. The material does feel a little cheap, and it does wrinkle easily. But I still do like it and will be keeping it.

Love this dress! The only things is that to wear without a bra, there's a weird fabric line that visually splits your boobs in two so I thought that looked a little weird. I just put in removable bra pads to fix this issue!

Never even got to wear this dress. I put it in the wash (I wash all of my clothes prior to wearing)  and it unraveled at the waist and tie. It also seemed to shrink 3 inches at the bottom. Very disappointed in this dress.
The sizing was a little off on this. Just wasn’t my favorite look.
right from the package dress was damp and had a very bad odor it was so bad I instantly got a headache
It’s exactly as pictured material is light and comfortable and it’s true to size. Good quality dress.

The dress itself is very pretty, it’s a nice silhouette and was exactly what I was looking for to wear in family photos. I’m 5’2” and it was about 2” too long but I wore heels and it was ok. The dress arrived damp though, and that’s my 3rd Cupshe purchase that arrived damp to idk what’s up with that.  The strap came off at the stitching after about 2 hours of wear, I didn’t tug on it and it didn’t get caught on anything I just leaned over and the strap came off. I’m hoping to fix it to wear again but I am disappointed that I have to, for the cost of the dress I should not have to repair straps so soon.

The good: -The dress is cute & it’s basically what is in the picture. -The dress got here fast. -The dress is long (to my ankles) -Comfortable if you’re not moving around  The bad: -No padding in the breast area & you can’t wear a bra (even a strapless bra, I tried) -My boobs almost fell out of the dress multiple times (do NOT bend over) -The fabric is kind of thin/see through so don’t wear dark underwear -It’s a litter difficult to die the back on your own, you either get it too tight and you have back fat hanging over or it’s too loose and your boobs start to fall out of the front.
Love this dress. My favorite dress this summer so far
The color was subtle and it was perfect to wear for a rehearsal dinner. I am taking it on vacation too!!
I have an hourglass figure but the dress wasn’t anywhere near as cute as the picture. I returned.

The dress was cute, but the stitching at the waist was crooked and the color was a little off from the picture. Slightly greenish undertone more than a solid yellow. Returned, but would try again in a different color, for well.
It’s a great fit and so comfy. I got a large and I’m 5’8/170. But unfortunately there’s a stain on the dress when I removed it from the bag.

If this was a different material I would likely buy it in every color. I love the cut and fit of this dress but the material is too thin and wrinkled. The purple color was also more pastel than pictured.

I had really high hopes for this dress, looks beautiful on the model, but it was definitely not nearly as flattering on me. The dress seemed pretty flimsy and wrinkly with very little support for bigger chested women. The fit definitely wasn’t as I’d hoped for. Returned this dress, but probably has potential to be cute for another buyer.
Fits well, perfect length
This dress is bigger than what the measurements state. Medium was very big on me and the dress there is a bit see-through.
The dress tore as soon as I washed it
I was very excited about a black maxi dress. However, I was driving to a party and I went to get out of the car and my strap just broke. Horrible, made very cheaply.

I really loved this dress but after only 1 wash in cold water and hung to dry , the dress shrunk so much in length. I had read that in other reviews but after experiencing it myself, I concluded it’s a wear once dress and that’s it!
Megusto

This dress is perfect in every possible way. Beachy, flowy, comfortable, cute and the teal color is gorgeous. I wore this dress to a wedding and got so many complements! If you’re between sizes, I would size down since the back is stretchy and adjustable with the bow.
Gappy, I should have ordered a large and not an XL. Wrinkled. I think it would look better if I had a larger bust, flattening in chest. Nice style!
Loved the dress for our Mexico trip! Material was good quality, wasn’t see through. Light and flowy. loved the fit. Was easy to steam and get wrinkles out after rolling it up in a suitcase.

I’m 5’9. 32D at VS. usually wear size S or M.  I would need to size down to XS as the waist band has so much stretch and the back tie is so adjustable.  The cups are not lined. Kind of a neon mustard yellow color. Felt like it hit me at a weird length.
This dress is gray for summer or vacations! Very pretty color and the fit is so comfortable

I intended to wear this to a class reunion but it arrived very wrinkled in the bag so I washed it just to freshen it up and remove the wrinkles and not only did it shrink a LOT, it went from touching the floor to now showing my ankles, the fabric is not  early as soft as it was before I washed it.. it also has a seam that came apart not sure before of after I washed it... But all the way down the inside of the bust... Now now I'm off to find another dress today...

The orange color was as pictured. The shape was as pictured as well. Unfortunately, there is no support up top and no way to wear a bra.  I thought that since the straps are adjustable and the back ties, it would have support similar to a bathing suit top, but nope.  It’s somehow worse. I am a 34C or 32DD (in VS) 125 and purchased a small.

Wanted to love this dress but having a bigger chest did not work with this. The stitching goes right across your breast and splits it into 2. Looked very strange. I returned it. I’m about a 38DD right now due to breastfeeding
Great dress for a graduation dinner! There’s no support in the top so I wore a strapless backless adhesive bra. It was a hot day and this kept me cool.
At least in this color the fabric was seethrough and overall the dress did not look to be good quality. Also the chest area did not fit quite right.

Nice quality material and the top is adjustable with fairly good coverage.  The waist also is very accomodating so if you have a bigger waist or wide hips... this will still fit.  The color is more on the mustard-y yellow but it's still cute.  I'm 5'8", 160lb and ordered a medium

I love the fabric, not too thick and not see through but I need chest support so I can’t go braless. This dress makes it difficult to find a solution where I can have support with no bra showing. So before purchasing, be aware there’s no extra padding. Otherwise the fit and length was great, I’m 5’6, 128 pounds, and I bought a small.

Love love love this dress. Thin and light weight but not see through. The fit is just amazing. Since the top ties in back and has adjustable straps you can really make sure it fits just how you like it! The waist at the back is elastic so also super comfortable. Can’t say enough how much I love this. Got so many complements and danced the night away!!

评论概述: Fit in the bust is weird
评论详情: I really wanted to love this dress, but unfortunately it's a bit sheer for me and the bust seems small for the size. I think this could be a really flattering swim cover-up or a regular dress with appropriate underwear. Maybe order a size up if you have big boobs. Unfortunately this is going to be a return for me, but if you're looking for something lightweight this could be cute for you!
True to size, color is spot on. Very cute dress for the summer.
hermoso vestido material es muy suave
If you’re short and are not curvy it might not be the best dress. We made modifications to make it fit but it worked out

The dress is very cute and flattering. I’m 5’4 145 lbs and got a medium. I knocked off one star because the dress arrived very wrinkled. It was clearly tried on by someone, stuffed back in the bag and returned.
Schönes Kleid und eine echte Alternative zu vielen ähnlichen Kleidern aus Polyester etc. Durch die Baumwolle ist es gerade für den Sommer optimal. Knittert nur schnell
Sieht absolut nicht so aus wie auf den Bildern. Es hat absolut keinen Schnitt hängt wie ein katoffelsack. Viel zu eng.
Sowas hab ich noch nie erlebt. Habe es gebügelt und es hat sofort geknittert als ich es mir berührt hatte. Hinsetzen kann man damit auch vergessen.
Love the look, colour and size of the dress to the straps and flow of the dress except for the chest size. Doesn’t fit bigger chest size women.
Super schönes Kleid
Tolle Farbe.  Toller Schnitt  leider bereits  nach der 1 Wäsche Nähte ausgefranst (mit der heißen Badel genäht  .  :(((
Ich liebe dieses Kleid. Es ist von guter Qualität und angenehm auf der Haut. Durch die Schnürung am Rücken kann man es um ein par cm vergrößern oder verkleinern.

Love this dress. Light material, can adjust the tie in the back and the straps to fit bust. I am a 38 C and am wearing a sticky bra which works well. I purchased for a beach wedding and it will be perfect. Color is just as pictured. I’m 5’8 and 193 lbs. I got the large and it’s perfect.
J’ai dorer la couleur et elle fesais très bien . Très belle robe pour une évènement
The tie part was ripped but apart from that it is a lovley dress

I bought this for a wedding and was quite skeptical but I absolutely love it. It was perfect and light weight and looked so cute. It did come quite wrinkly but very fixable. I will likely buy this is another color. If you’re debating I say go for it!
I like colour and design. This dress feel comfortable, value for money, fit well. The material good quality for price but crease a lot.

Mir gefällt das Kleid sehr. Der Rücken ausschnitt ist wunderschön. Hatte es im Urlaub in Spanien an und hab mich darin sehr wohl gefühlt. Durch den Leinenähnlichen Stoff hat es ein sehr angenehmes Tragegefühl.
Tolles Kleid und passt perfekt. Schade nuch dass die Farbe Violet nicht wirklech passt. Es ist eher blau.
Das Kleid sitzt wirklich gut! Leider ist das Material sehr faltenanfällig, daher ging es leider zurück. Farbe passt zu Bild.
